entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:38 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 09:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -12.4°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -16.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
